meanings.sent1: The parasitizations of the host weakened its immune system.
meanings.sent2: The parasitizations in the ecosystem were causing harm to various species.
meanings.sent3: The parasitizations in the garden made the plants play a game of hide and seek with the pests.
meanings.sent4: The parasitizations on society were like invisible leeches draining its resources.
meanings.sent5: The parasitizations on the dog were so numerous that it looked like a walking buffet for parasites.

meanings.definition: The process of being infected by a parasite.
meanings.sent1: The parasitizations of the fish led to its decline in population.
meanings.sent2: The parasitizations of the crops resulted in poor harvests.
meanings.sent3: The parasitizations in the zoo made the animals throw a parasite party.
meanings.sent4: The parasitizations in the computer system were like viruses spreading through a network.
meanings.sent5: The parasitizations in the body were like unwelcome guests overstaying their welcome.
